preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: Seam RESTEasy is a lightweight module that aims to provide additional features for developing JAX-RS web services in Java EE environment.

Seam RESTEasy is portable among CDI implementations. However, since the JAX-RS specification does not provide a full-scale SPI, the Seam RESTEasy module is tied to RESTEasy (one of JAX-RS implementations).
